titleStmt.title: The New England almanack for the year of our Lord MDCC from the creation 5649 and from the discovery of America by Chr. Columbus ... being leap year & of the reign of ... King William the Third ... / by Samuel Clough.
titleStmt.author: Clough, Samuel, d. 1707.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Bartholomew Green & John Allen,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
